V1 Web API¶

Builds¶

GET /v1/builds¶

Returns all builds.

Return type:list(Build)
POST /v1/builds¶

launch build :type build: Build

Return type:unicode
GET /v1/builds/(build)/log¶

Returns log of a build.

GET /v1/builds/(build)/distro¶

List distros of a build

Return type:list(str)
GET /v1/builds/(build)/distro/(distro)/(distro_name)¶

Returns a specific distro.

GET /v1/builds/(build)/distro/(distro)/log¶

Returns log of a specific distro.

GET /v1/builds/(build)/distro/(distro)/download¶

Returns log of a specific distro.

type Build¶

Data samples:

Json
{
    "branch": "master", 
    "commit": null, 
    "created": null, 
    "package_name": null, 
    "package_release": null, 
    "package_version": null, 
    "source_type": "git", 
    "source_url": "https://github.com/kaji-project/shinken.git"
}
XML
<value>
  <source_url>https://github.com/kaji-project/shinken.git</source_url>
  <source_type>git</source_type>
  <commit nil="true" />
  <branch>master</branch>
  <created nil="true" />
  <package_name nil="true" />
  <package_version nil="true" />
  <package_release nil="true" />
</value>
